name: 鍾孟雲
objective:
隨著人工智慧、5G 通訊網路與感測技術的迅速發展，智慧物聯網應用已成為現代產業關注的核心領域。這些技術正加速整合，廣泛應用於智慧家庭、智慧醫療、工業自動化及環境監測等多個場域，推動系統朝向智慧化、自動化與自我調適的方向發展。本課程旨在培養學生具備人工智慧與物聯網的基礎知識與實作能力，並透過專題與實驗導向的學習模式，深入理解智慧系統的核心技術。課程內容涵蓋物聯網架構、感測器整合、資料傳輸模組等主題，學生將學習如何使用 Arduino 等嵌入式平台設計與建置實體系統。除了傳統人工智慧的應用外，本課程亦有生成式人工智慧的潛在應用。學生將了解大型語言模型或圖像生成模型，進行資料合成、異常偵測、自然語言介面設計，以及智慧決策支援，拓展物聯網應用的智能層次。為使學生具備設計與實作智慧物聯網系統的能力，並能將生成式 AI 融入創新應用中，為未來跨領域的技術整合與產業發展打下堅實基礎。
With the rapid development of artificial intelligence (AI), 5G communication networks, and sensing technologies, smart Internet of Things (IoT) applications have become a key focus in modern industries. These technologies are increasingly being integrated and widely applied in areas such as smart homes, healthcare, industrial automation, and environmental monitoring, driving systems toward greater intelligence, automation, and adaptability. This course is designed to equip students with fundamental knowledge and practical skills in both AI and IoT, adopting a project-based and hands-on learning approach to help them gain a deep understanding of core technologies in intelligent systems. Course topics include IoT architecture, sensor integration, and data transmission modules. Students will learn how to design and build physical systems using embedded platforms such as Arduino. In addition to conventional AI applications, the course also explores the potential of Generative Artificial Intelligence (Generative AI). Students will be introduced to large language models and image generation models, and how they can be applied in data synthesis, anomaly detection, natural language interface design, and intelligent decision support, further enhancing the intelligence level of IoT applications. The ultimate goal of this course is to enable students to design and implement smart IoT systems and to integrate generative AI into innovative applications, laying a solid foundation for future interdisciplinary technology integration and industry development.
